alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Fayette; Gibson; Hardeman; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Crockett, eastern Tipton, southeastern Dyer, southern Gibson, Fayette, northwestern Hardeman, eastern Lauderdale, Haywood, western Madison and northeastern Shelby Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chestnut Bluff to 7 miles southwest of Brownsville to near Ellendale. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Bartlett, Brownsville, Millington, Covington, Humboldt, Ripley, Milan, Trenton, Lakeland, Arlington, Fairview, Munford, Whiteville, Somerville, Brighton, Alamo, Bells, Halls and Three Way. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for west Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Crockett; Dyer; Fayette; Gibson; Hardeman; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison; Shelby; Tipton
